item.description:
Format: Sealed Deck â€“ Scars of Mirrodin/New Phyrexia
Swiss-Style (based on # of wins rather than knock-out elimination)

30 Minute deck construction,
3 rounds, 50 min each (best of 3),
4th round playoff between top players

Prizes: 1 pack of New Phyrexia for each round won. All players will receive a Promotional, Alternate-Art foil Phyrexian Metamorph, a powerful new rare from New Phyrexia!
item.why:
New Magic set!
All players will receive a Promotional, Alternate-Art foil Phyrexian Metamorph, a powerful new rare from New Phyrexia!
The war has ended... ...a new reign has begun.
NEW PHYREXIA -Launch Party Tournament-
item.name: New Phyrexia Launch Party
